Name: The Legends of Class one 嗨哥一班大冒险
About the game: About this game: The Legends of Class one is a spoof-style RPG adventure game curated by BedeckeHimmel. This game tells a group of students to travel to different worlds. At the request of the creation god, they are looking for 4 ice crystal balls to save classmates. How to play: This game is a one-line plot, the customs clearance time is about 2 hours. The operation method is the RPG MAKER game standard mode, and the combat system has made some improvements on the RPG MAKER default system to make it more interesting. The content filtering system has been added to the game. If the filtering system is turned off, you can experience the standard swearing mantra of the protagonists. Secondly, there is a BOSS difficulty adjustment system, but if you reduce the difficulty, the reward will also decrease.
